title: Jhoan Carrero - Technology Entrepreneur
main-description: Computer Professional, lover of technology and music with knowledge about networks, physics and mathematics
name: Name
about-text: In love with technology, I decided to learn about computers and everything related to networks; I am fascinated by how incredible things can be done when you get to it, where creativity, imagination and logic are perfectly combined, because this is a world to be in continuous learning and of course, in this world is where I want to be.

experience.description: I work in Frontend and Backend tasks, in Frontend leading a development team with the NextJS framework, configuring a direct communication with UX through Storybook and implementing Redux Sagas for communication with a Loopback 4 Backend with MongoDB and MySQL databases, as well solving problems in previous projects due to migrations from Google Cloud to AWS.
